title: 50 Nintendo Switch Games Discounted, Including Dozens Of Mario, Zelda, And Pokemon Titles
description: Nintendo finally unveiled the Switch 2 this week with a brief teaser trailer. The full reveal is slated for a Nintendo Direct on April 2, so fans will have to wait a few more months to find out when the next-gen console hits store shelves. In the meantime, you can clear out your Switch wishlist and chip away at your backlog for less thanks to Woot's massive ongoing Nintendo Switch game sale. Dozens of Switch games, many of which are exclusives, are discounted at the Amazon-owned retailer. The lineup of Switch game deals includes a bunch of Super Mario, Pokemon, and Zelda games. See all Switch deals at Woot Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: PlayStation Cancels Two Games, Including A Live-Service God Of War - Report
description: PlayStation has canceled two live-service games, and one of them was reportedly based in the God of War universe.In a statement to Bloomberg, Sony confirmed the cancellation of the two live-service games--one from Bend Studio and another from Bluepoint Games. The one that Bluepoint Games was working on was reportedly a live-service God of War game.Sony also confirmed that while the studios won't be shutting down, it wouldn't confirm whether these cancellations will result in layoffs. However, Sony is working with the studios to determine their next projects.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Severance Season 1 Finale Was Almost Shot From The Innies' Perspective
description: Much as we viewers try to mentally piece together all the scenes in Severance to better grasp the big picture of its mysteries, Ben Stiller and his team engage in the similar process of considering how to present those scenes to us. On the final episode of The Severance Podcast with Ben Stiller and Adam Scott’s first…Read more...

title: Here's When Switch 2 Pre-Orders Might Go Live
description: On January 16, Nintendo officially unveiled the successor to its incredibly popular Switch. The new device is simply called the Switch 2, it’s bigger, sleeker, and most of your old games should work on it. But now, the next question you might have is “When or where can I pre-order this thing?”Read more...

title: How to unlock all Tonics in Destiny 2
description: Tonics are the special episodic mechanic for Destiny 2’s episode Revenant, the second in Bungie’s post-Final Shape epilogue releases. These Tonics help you target certain gear pieces to farm (granting you bonus loot of your chosen type) and can also enhance your artifact perks for the season, making your build even more powerful. title: Nintendo Switch 2 reveal ditched showing players in silly scenarios
description: Nintendo finally released a first look at the highly-anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 on Thursday. The brief trailer zoomed in on the hardware design (literally) in a sleek animated video and gave us a look at new features of the console like a mysterious C-button and its new snap-in Joy-Con controllers. title: Tales Of Graces f Remastered is out on PC for the first time, with new quality-of-life updates
description: Like many JRPG series, it feels as if the Tales Of series has made strides in popularity in recent years. Both 2016's Tales Of Berseria and 2021's Tales Of Arise had charming worlds and flashy combat, and the latter has found a home on our picks for the best of the genre. Now the series is adopting the other dominant JRPG trend of late: remakes and remasters. Tales Of Graces f Remastered, a revision of the 2009 entry in the series, is out now. Read more
author: Graham Smith

title: Tokyo Xtreme Racer returns to the road for the first time in 18 years next week
description: The announcement of a new Tokyo Xtreme Racer for the first time in 18 years was a welcome surprise at the end of 2024. It now has a release date: January 23rd. It's an Early Access launch, but I am excited to drive a gaudy monstrosity on a Japanese highway. Read more

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 864
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. How late do you stay up at night? If it’s all working out to plan, then I’ll be asleep by 9:30. Typically, though, I’m asleep between 10-11. And if I’ve got insomnia, then I’ll see you at the witching hour, ha! 2. Last photo you took? Connor and I were at Nordstrom Rack yesterday to look for a dress for the father-daughter dance, and we saw a very colorful men’s t-shirt with a swimming white tiger swimming. It had sequins on it, too! I couldn’t help but take a picture of it because it make me chuckle. 3. What’s your scent of the day? Wearing an old fave today, Dolce & Gabanna The One. 4. Are you a person who likes to snack throughout the day? Not[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 864 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 846
description: Rosie hasn’t been taking the best care of herself. She’s been so busy at work with all of the scientific papers she published last year that she hasn’t been eating as well as she should, and she hasn’t been exercising. But that’s in the past now. It’s January 2025, and that means new year’s resolutions. Fur starters…fitness! 😸 Rosie got a membership to The Hello Kitty Bounce House, a new cat fitness gym. It’s the latest craze in feline fitness. They say that 10 minutes of bouncing burns as many calories as 12 hours of napping! That sounded great to Rosie, so she signed up for a year. But that’s not all. She also started playing pickleball. Marnie was already an avid runner last year, so she didn’t officially set a “fitness resolution,” but she did want to show her manager Rosie that she’s a team player… So, she’s decided to try out for the new season of American Ninja Warrior! Tabs, of course, was famous for his ambitious resolutions. Interestingly, they usually involved fitness…[Continue reading...] The post Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 846 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Microsoft reportedly makes "small" number of further layoffs across divisions including gaming
